00006 //We don't want YR++ to depend on the DirectX7 SDK (yet), so
00007 //here are a few definitions taken from the MSDN:

00009 //DDPIXELFORMAT
00010 typedef struct _DDPIXELFORMAT {
00011   DWORD  dwSize;
00012   DWORD  dwFlags;
00013   DWORD  dwFourCC;
00014 union {
00015   DWORD  dwRGBBitCount;
00016   DWORD  dwYUVBitCount;
00017   DWORD  dwZBufferBitDepth;
00018   DWORD  dwAlphaBitDepth;
00019   DWORD  dwLuminanceBitCount;
00020   DWORD  dwBumpBitCount;
00021   DWORD  dwPrivateFormatBitCount;
00022 } ;
00023 union {
00024   DWORD  dwRBitMask;
00025   DWORD  dwYBitMask;
00026   DWORD  dwStencilBitDepth;
00027   DWORD  dwLuminanceBitMask;
00028   DWORD  dwBumpDuBitMask;
00029   DWORD  dwOperations;
00030 } ;
00031 union {
00032   DWORD  dwGBitMask;
00033   DWORD  dwUBitMask;
00034   DWORD  dwZBitMask;
00035   DWORD  dwBumpDvBitMask;
00036   struct {
00037     WORD wFlipMSTypes;
00038     WORD wBltMSTypes;
00039   } MultiSampleCaps;
00040 } ;
00041 union {
00042   DWORD  dwBBitMask;

00044   DWORD  dwStencilBitMask;
00045   DWORD  dwBumpLuminanceBitMask;
00046 } ;
00047 union {
00048   DWORD  dwRGBAlphaBitMask;

00050   DWORD  dwLuminanceAlphaBitMask;

00053 } ;
00054 } DDPIXELFORMAT, FAR* LPDDPIXELFORMAT;
